description: Reference ID for the Data Load

Financial_Aid_Period_RecordObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Financial_Aid_Period_RecordObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Financial_Aid_Period_RecordObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Container element for the Period Details Overrides for a Financial Aid Period Record

validation.validation: You can only override weeks of instruction if the Override Weeks Of Instruction check box is selected.
validation.description: You can only override weeks of instruction if the Override Weeks Of Instruction check box is selected.

validation.validation: The overridden academic year type specified is BBAY 1. This isn't valid with the configuration on the Federal Student Aid Program Ruleset.
validation.description: The Academic Year Type does not match the type configured on the Federal Student Aid Program Ruleset for the Primary Program of Study of the Reporting Record for the Period, BBAY 1.

validation.validation: The Order in Academic Year Sequence must be less than or equal to the number of Financial Aid Criteria Award Year Academic Periods on the Federal Student Aid Program Rule Set.
You can only override Order in Academic Year Sequence if you also set the Order in Academic Year Sequence Override Boolean to true.
The overridden academic year type specified is BBAY 3. This isn't valid with the configuration on the Federal Student Aid Program Ruleset.
validation.description: The Academic Year Type does not match the type configured on the Federal Student Aid Program Ruleset for the Primary Program of Study of the Reporting Record for the Period, BBAY 3.

validation.validation: The overridden academic year type specified is SAY. This isn't valid with the configuration on the Federal Student Aid Program Ruleset.
validation.description: The Academic Year Type does not match the type configured on the Federal Student Aid Program Ruleset for the Primary Program of Study of the Reporting Record for the Period, Summer Trailer.

validation.validation: To override period details, specify an Academic Year Sequence that is a counting number.
validation.description: To override period details, specify an Academic Year Sequence that is a counting number.

validation.validation: To override period details, specify an Order in Academic Year Sequence Number that is a counting number.
validation.description: To override period details, specify an Order in Academic Year Sequence Number that is a counting number.

validation.validation: You can only override Academic Year Type if the Override Academic Year Type Boolean is true.
validation.description: You can only override Academic Year Type if the Override Academic Year Type Boolean is true.

validation.validation: The overridden academic year type specified is SAY. This isn't valid with the configuration on the Federal Student Aid Program Ruleset.
validation.description: The Academic Year Type does not match the type configured on the Federal Student Aid Program Ruleset for the Primary Program of Study of the Reporting Record for the Period, Summer Header.

validation.validation: The Academic Year Type is set to BBAY1. You must include an Override for the Order in Academic Year Sequence Number on the associated period.
validation.description: The Academic Year Type is set to BBAY1. You must include an Override for the Order in Sequence on the associated period.

validation.validation: Enter a valid Academic Year Type.
validation.description: Enter a valid Academic Year Type.

validation.validation: You can only override Academic Year Sequence if the Override Academic Year Sequence boolean is true.
validation.description: The numeric attribute specified to override has to be greater than Zero
